message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"washroom; a place to wash your hands and use the toilet","sentence":"这里有洗手间。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style illustration of a simple, clean washroom. There is a sink with a mirror, a toilet, tiled walls and floor, and a small window letting in gentle light. The scene has a slightly dreamlike, slightly surreal ruined background, but the washroom is intact, with subtle hints of apocalyptic atmosphere outside the window. No people visible. Label the door in Chinese characters as 洗手间.","sentence_translation":"There is a washroom here."}
